categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Unidentified Human male Jedi 3  (Capture of Darth Revan)
A Human male individual was a member of the Jedi Order during the Jedi Civil War. He wielded a green-bladed lightsaber in combat.

During the Jedi Civil War this Jedi was a member of the strike team sent to capture Darth Revan, alongside Bastila Shan and five others. The Jedi successfully boarded Revan's flagship and fought their way to the bridge to confront the Dark Lord. While his comrades secured the unconscious Revan, the Jedi made sure there were no more enemies to challenge them.
The Jedi's face is one of the available male faces for Revan, to be chosen by the player at the start of Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.[source?]
